snippet.title: Assetto Corsa Mobile - Official iOS Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Assetto Corsa Mobile is available now for iPhone and iPad. Check out the trailer for the racing simulation game inspired by Assetto Corsa, featuring 59 official race cars, and speed down 9 different circuits, each laser-scanned directly from Assetto Corsa. Each track has time of day variations and weather conditions - rain challenges even the most seasoned racers.

Choose from six different modes: start with Practice to learn the ropes, then move on to Classic Race to test those skills. Compete for the best lap time in Time Attack, hone consistency in Endurance, learn to maneuver around opponents in Overtake, and strive for pure velocity in Speed Camera.

#IGN #Gaming
